document.full_text: peru's presidential front-runner keiko fujimori has hired former new york city mayor rudy giuliani as an adviser, trying to bolster her law-and-order credentials without relying on the image of her divisive father, jailed former president alberto fujimori.
document.title: peru's fujimori hires crime-stopper giuliani
lines_and_colors: peru's presidential front-runner keiko fujimori has hired former new york city mayor rudy giuliani as an adviser, trying to bolster her law-and-order credentials without relying on the image of her divisive father, jailed former president alberto fujimori.
